org.jscsi.initiator.taskbalancer

Interface ITaskBalancer

  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface ITaskBalancer

    ILoadBalancer

    This is an load balancer to distribute the workload to all opened connections within a session.

    Author:
    Volker Wildi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connection getConnection()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the next connection, which should used for the next task.
      void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
      Deprecated. 
      Releases a used connection, so that it can be used by another task.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        Connection getConnection()
                         throws org.jscsi.exception.NoSuchConnectionException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the next connection, which should used for the next task.
        Returns:
        The Connection instance to use.
        Throws:
        org.jscsi.exception.NoSuchConnectionException - If there is no such connection.

      • releaseConnection

        void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
                       throws org.jscsi.exception.NoSuchConnectionException
        Deprecated. 
        Releases a used connection, so that it can be used by another task.
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection instance to release.
        Throws:
        org.jscsi.exception.NoSuchConnectionException - If there is no such connection.
